Uses of Package
eu.iv4xr.framework.spatial

Packages that use eu.iv4xr.framework.spatial
Package
Description
eu.iv4xr.framework.environments
 
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl.gameworldmodel
Provide a class, GameWorldModel, that can be used as a model of a "computer game".
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding
This package provides classes to do pathfinding over a graph.
eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts
 
eu.iv4xr.framework.spatial
 
eu.iv4xr.framework.spatial.meshes
Provide mainly the class Mesh for representing 3D surface meshes.
nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon
MiniDungen is a Nethack-like game.
nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon.testAgent
This package contains the implementation of iv4xr Env, State, TacticLib, GoalLib etc, which are necessary to allow an aplib/iv4xr test agent to control the game in the smart way.
